OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_ID.description: A unique UUIDv4 identifier for this connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

CTIBUTLER_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for the CTI Butler API.

CTIBUTLER_KNOWLEDGEBASES.description: A comma-separated list of knowledge bases to import (e.g., attack-enterprise,capec). Available options: attack-enterprise, attack-mobile, attack-ics, capec, disarm, atlas, location, sector.

CTIBUTLER_INTERVAL_DAYS.description: Polling interval in days. The connector polls CTI Butler for updates to the selected knowledge bases at this interval. The minimum (and recommended) value is 7.
